conversation.text: Based on your preference for memoir movies, I recommend 'A Million Little Pieces' (2003), which follows a drug-dependent young man's journey towards recovery and self-discovery. Starring James Franco, Mila Kunis, and Ethan Hawke, the movie offers a raw and emotional portrayal of addiction and recovery.

conversation.text: If you're looking for a movie that combines historical intrigue and physical feats, 'Man on Wire' would be a great choice. It tells the story of tightrope walker Philippe Petit's daring high-wire routine between New York City's World Trade Center towers in 1974. This film is full of thrilling moments and fascinating insights into the world of illusionists.
